nodes.text: Oryon was a male Bothan spy who worked for the Republic Intelligence during the Clone Wars and later the Erased.

After Chancellor Palpatine reorganized the Republic into the Galactic Empire, Oryon joined the Erased. When a group of stormtroopers attacked a base of the Erased, he helped save his friends, but not all of them. He traveled with Jedi Master Fy-Tor-Ana to rescue Ferus Olin, and with them helped temporarily rid Naboo of Imperial presence. Oryon later helped Fy-Tor-Ana rescue two of Ferus's friends, Roan Lands and Dona Telamark, from the government on Bellassa, with help from The Eleven. Oryon was killed when Darth Vader destroyed the asteroid.
Oryon was known to use a light Repeating blaster
